I agree with this statement.
I think that famous people deserve to have a private life like all the normal people, without journalists following them all the time.
A famous person should have the chance to go on his own for a walk without having the annoying impression of being followed.
In my opinion the journalists should have more respect for the private lifelives of the famous people. They should understand when it is too much, when they are going too far.
For instance, the tragic death of Princess Diana is an example of what a journalist must not do. In this occasioninstance we can say that the journalists have, of course indirectly, caused her death.
